newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egypt pound o/n rates up in liquid market.
newsitem.headline: Egypt pound o/n rates up in liquid market.

text.p: Overnight interbank rates on the Egyptian pound widened on Wednesday in a liquid private-sector market to between eight and nine percent from a range of eight to 8-1/2 percent on Tuesday.
One banker said he did not deal but he heard the rates were higher at 8-3/4 to 9-1/2.
None of four bankers polled said they made one-week deals, but they said they heard rates were 8-3/4 to 9-1/2.
Public-sector banks kept their rates at 10-1/2 percent.
